author: easilar
body:
#### PR description:

In broad strokes, the goal of this reorganization is to put standardValidation (which takes AOD inputs) and miniaodValidation (MiniAOD inputs) on equal footing. In doing so, more histograms will be created in the miniaodValidation step, and the standardValidation procedure will become obsolete. 
 -First Plan presentation in DQM general meeting: https://indico.cern.ch/event/870363/contributions/3670599/attachments/1975330/3287515/Tau_DQM_SequenceReview_Jan21st.pdf
  -The details of the planned changes are presented in Tau POG meetings and in PPD meeting: https://indico.cern.ch/event/997168/contributions/4288672/attachments/2214999/3749685/PPDWorkshop.pdf
 -Related twiki page: https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/SWGuidePFTauIDValidation


#### PR validation:


PR passes the basic test procedure :
```
cd src
scram b distclean 
git cms-checkdeps -a -A
scram b -j 8
scram b runtests
```

PR passes also additional tests for tau dqm offline validation:
```
 cd Validation/RecoTau/test/
 cmsRun config.py
 cmsRun harvesting.py
```
title: Tau dqm aod to miniaod for mc
